member.name: MIB_UDPTABLE_OWNER_PID
member.summary: The MIB_UDPTABLE_OWNER_PID structure contains the User Datagram Protocol (UDP) listener table for IPv4 on the local computer. The table also includes the process ID (PID) that issued the call to the function for each UDP endpoint.

member.name: MIB_UDPTABLE_OWNER_PID.dwNumEntries
member.summary: The number of elements in table.

member.name: MIB_UDPTABLE_OWNER_PID.table
member.summary: An array of structures returned by a call to .
